wikiData.title: Caetano v. Massachusetts
wikiData.Prior: On Petition for Writ of Certiorari to the Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts
wikiData.Procedural: Motion to dismiss denied, sub nom. ''Commonwealth v. Caetano'', No. 1149-CR-2522 ([[Massachusetts District Court|Mass. Dist. Ct.]] April 29, 2013); defendant convicted, No. 1149-CR-2522, Mass. Dist. Ct.; aff'd, 26 [[North Eastern Reporter|N. E. 3d]] 688 ([[Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts|Mass.]] 2015)
wikiData.Holding: The Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts' erred in upholding a law that prohibited the possession of stun guns
wikiData.LawsApplied: [[Second Amendment to the United States Constitution|U.S. Const. amend. II]]; [[Massachusetts General Laws|Mass. Gen. Laws]], ch. 140, §131J (2014)
